text: Baasikisine lisu'ba lyo kwembana na Pauli. Lisu'ba lyo baamwisili bandu baingi panyumba yatamage. Bu'ka kindai' mpaka kitamwiyo, Pauli aabakie makowe maingi pamope na kwakong'ondelya makowe ga Ukulungwa wa Nnu'ngu'. Abiniage bau'bi'li abali ya Yesu, katumya mayi'gi'yo ga salya ya Musa na itabu ya alondoli ba Nnu'ngu'.
